DOC.brief_summary: To identify outcome measure cancer control Head Neck cancer patient population University Pennsylvania ( HUP , PAH , Presby ) administer various functional outcome survey questionnaires reconstructive surgery . We hope ultimately develop QOL indicator reflect impact reconstructive surgery patient 's quality life , help therapeutic intervention explanation expectation prior surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Outcome Measures Head Neck Patients
DOC.criteria: Subjects consent Otorhinolaryngology Research Registry undergo free flap surgery . No child , pregnant woman , prisoner consent .
